page.title: 07New Houses,Sherburn-in-Elmet
page.content: {Future Housing Development in {Sherburn.}A new private estate by Persimmon Homes is being built on the eastern side of Low Street.Additional homes are also to be built off Croftway.Planning permission has been granted for 475 homes to be built in fields behind Qualter's. Access to these homes will be through Cardinal Close and through the Persimmon estate.The population of Sherburn is expected to rise to 5,536 by 1991.The in-fill policy of housing as stated in the North Yorkshire county plan can be seen to be followed in the residential development in Sherburn.The village has expanded rapidly during recent years due to the development of the Selby Coalfield and the expansion of the Enterprise Park Trading Estate on Moor Lane.
